name: Petrified.
description:
An experiment with using audio recordings and recreating old console style pixelated graphics.

Walk around with WASD, press Space to jump and hold Shift to run. Explore the 3 areas around town to hear recordings describing what occurred there. Come back to the center statue when you have explored enough.

If you get stuck at any time press R to restart the game.

All audio from Vincent Price found at moviesounds.org
